message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the diminishing value over time. This way we both benefit.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is slightly more generous than before. 58-42 is the best I can do for now.
Alice, the clock is ticking, and we both lose if this drags on.  I'm coming down to 52/48.  Let's close this out and both walk away with something.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. 57-43 is my new offer. Time is running out, let's make a deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now.  Any further delays only hurt us both.  Take it or leave it.
